cobblemon.species.pebble.name: Pebble
cobblemon.species.pebble.desc1: Here's Pebble: small, brown and round, it'll go everywhere with you at high speed, even if you don't want to.
cobblemon.species.pebble.desc2: Should a pebble run out of life points, it will teleport to another dimension in search of a MEDIC!

cobblemon.species.maidoleric.name: Maidoleric
cobblemon.species.maidoleric.desc1: Maidoleric; the result of an experiment gone wrong where God's offspring created this.
cobblemon.species.maidoleric.desc2: If you feel any confusion when observing this pokemon, it's normal: it's a combination of Marcoleric's charisma and the absence of a father figure.
cobblemon.species.oursoleric.name: Bearleric
cobblemon.species.oursoleric.desc1: I won’t say anything, otherwise I’ll get BAN.
cobblemon.species.egg.name: Eggdog
cobblemon.species.egg.desc1: This little being full of tenderness, coming from the internet appeared recently during a transfer of egg photo and installation of Nintendog on the computer of the lord of memes.
cobblemon.species.egg.desc2: Now a competitor of the pebble species, its development in our Minecraftian universe remains mysterious, strange, with a little salt on it and not too cooked.
